code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import logo from'../../assets/tmovie.png';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./header.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Header=function Header(){var headerNav=[{display:'Home',link:'/'},{display:'Movies',link:'/movies'},{display:'Tv Series',link:'/tvseries'}];var headerRef=useRef(null);var scrollTopRef=useRef(null);var addShrinkClass=function addShrinkClass(){window.scrollY>100?headerRef.current.classList.add('shrink'):headerRef.current.classList.remove('shrink');};var scrollTopHeight=function scrollTopHeight(){if(window.scrollY>150){scrollTopRef.current.classList.add('active');}else{scrollTopRef.current.classList.remove('active');}};var scrollTop=function scrollTop(){window.scrollTo({behavior:"smooth",top:0});};useEffect(function(){window.addEventListener('scroll',addShrinkClass);window.addEventListener('scroll',scrollTopHeight);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"scroll-to-top",ref:scrollTopRef,onClick:scrollTop,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-chevron-up"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",ref:headerRef,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header__wrap container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"tMovies"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"header__nav",children:headerNav.map(function(n,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:n.link,children:n.display})},i);})})]})})]});};export default Header;
